Posts.Content: i take xeloda and get fatigued. i'm in to my 14th cycle. i take 1000 mg twice a day. i did take 1500 twice daily but my dr, reduced it. Â you need to learn how to compensate for the fatigue i don't use a walker i use a desk chair if i get fatigue i sit down. i use a scooter when i go to stores,my own. when i work outside i use a chair or garden cart with wheels. if you stop you will die. cancer never give up. i will nver give up so cancer is in for the fight of my life. keep the faith.
Posts.Title: Xeloda and fatigue
